DialogueOption.Text: I.. I think I just died in some ghost matter.
Wait.. I told you I died and you didn't freak out!

Dialogue.Page: Uhh, yeah? I thought it was pretty clear we were talking in dream terms.
Pretty normal to get nightmares of all your phobias the day you take off.. Just ask Riebeck.
Sheesh, I didn't know you were that paranoid about ghost matter you were dreaming about dying to it, though. Tektite really spooked ya, huh?
Look, your suit should alert you whenever there's ghost matter nearby at all, so don't worry about just randomly falling into a patch without warning.
Once you know there's ghost matter around, just use the scout to look out for it. You can even switch it to a handheld photo mode that lets you take pictures without launching it first.

It's so convenient, it's honestly out of my hands if you still manage to walk into some ghost matter.. <Pause=1> Unless you'd like me to just magically make all ghost matter disappear to idiotproof the star system.
Hm.
That reminds me of something interesting I heard in the village the other day, actually..
Hah! Sorry to get your hopes up, but it was probably just some nasty prank the kids were playing.
If you really wanna know... I overheard one of the kids in the village say that ghost matter disappears sometimes.
They were probably just trying to trick a more gullible hatchling into sticking a hand into some ghost matter.. Classic.
If you want, feel free to interrogate all those smallfries to figure out who it was and scold 'em for me. Don't want those kids losing a limb or two to something stupid now.
Oh, ok. Just cut me off then.
Bah, it's like you can sense when I'm about to sneakily ask you to do something.. On your way then, you rascal.
Cool. Just remember, there's five suspects: Mica, Tephra, Galena, Arkose, and Moraine.
Oh, you should try to be subtle with your questions, though.
They might catch wind of your little investigation otherwise.. Trust me, they're smarter than they look.
Try to ask real nonchalantly, like: "Did you hear anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?"
Ah... I'd be a great detective.
Stars above, just look around the village! They're all probably playing around somewhere.
Mica's probably still fiddling with the model rocket, just up the hill.
Tephra and Galena should be playing in the village somewhere.
I saw those two trekking outside the village recently for whatever reason, though - so don't take my word on that.
Arkose's probably still throwing rocks into the patch of ghost matter at the top of the village.
Still uh.. no idea why they do that all day.
And Moraine's probably stargazing on that big tree in the village, making sure Marl doesn't chop it down.
I wonder if that Marl'll ever let go of that grudge.. No good comes outta holding a grudge against a tree, y'know?
Oh, and try to be subtle with your questions. Otherwise, the kids might catch wind of your little investigation.
Try to ask them real nonchalantly, like: "Did you hear anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?"
Ah, I'd be a great detective.
Just get a move on - you'll probably find all of 'em on the way up to the observatory for those launch codes, anyway.
